title: 64: OBITCH dead in space...
description:
Greetings Geofflings, this week’s episode is out of this world, literally, buckle up because Spencer is taking us to space to learn all about death in space, but first Madison is giving us the lowdown on living funerals. We’ve got an obituary for a starlet, one for a real clown and of course we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminallllllls! 



New episodes come out every Thursday for free, with 1-week early access for Wondery+ subscribers.


Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 


Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com


Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes

PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807


Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast



Sources:

https://www.usurnsonline.com/funerals/living-funerals/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ULQ7mX9wIJg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BXWP_4uea-k

https://learningenglish.voanews.com/a/south-koreans-take-part-in-living-funerals-to-improve-lives/

https://www.ibtimes.co.uk/south-koreans-stage-fake-funerals-part-death-experience-make-them-appreciate-life-more-1573800

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ejEaJUEOhjs&t=96s

https://listverse.com/2017/08/22/10-shocking-cases-of-people-who-attended-their-own-funeral/

https://www.clanbreazeale.com/UncleBush/

https://www.odditycentral.com/news/chinese-student-holds-her-own-funeral-so-she-could-enjoy-it.html?quad_cc

https://www.smithsonianmag.com/smithsonian-institution/sad-story-laika-space-dog-and-her-one-way-trip-orbit-1-180968728/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soyuz_11

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jc5CXnuNR5c

https://www.popsci.com/what-happens-to-your-body-when-you-die-in-space/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Space_Shuttle_Challenger_disaster

https://www.breitbart.com/news/childless-bosnian-couple-stage-and-attend-their-own-funeral/

https://www.nj.com/news/2010/08/sussex_county_man_diagnosed_wi.html

https://www.nj.com/news/2010/08/sussex_county_man_diagnosed_wi.html

https://www.thevintagenews.com/2017/10/11/timothy-dexter-sold-coal-to-newcastle-faked-his-funeral-caned-his-wife-for-not-weeping/?safari=1

https://allthatsinteresting.com/timothy-dexter
